sections.heading: tax; power of appointment; exercise or nonexercise; not subject to tax
sections.text: The exercise or failure to exercise any power of appointment by the donee thereof, shall not be deemed a transfer which is subject to the provisions of sections 77-2001 to 77-2008.02.SourceLaws 1955, c. 301, ยง 2, p. 940.Annotatio
